snippet: Sister Mary Rose, a Roman Catholic nun, resuscitated Covenant House, the nation’s largest network of shelters for homeless youngsters, in the wake of a sex abuse scandal involving its founder.
abstract: Sister Mary Rose McGeady, Roman Catholic nun who resuscitated Covenant House, the nation’s largest network of shelters for homeless youngsters, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Sister Mary Rose, a Roman Catholic nun, resuscitated Covenant House, the nation’s largest network of shelters for homeless youngsters, in the wake of a sex abuse scandal involving its founder.

headline.seo: Sister Mary Rose McGeady, 84; Revived Shelter Network for Homeless Youths
headline.main: Mary Rose McGeady, Nun Who Led Youth Homes, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Mary Rose McGeady, 84, Nun Who Led Youth Homes
